additional information: The rate of decolorization decreased with an increase in dye concentration.
The decolorization was highest at lower concentrations.
Decolorization decreased at higher dye concentrations.
Dye degradation improved with the addition of small molecular mediators.

decolorization result: Significant improvement with lac2-9 over rlac1338
additional information: Enhanced degradation due to directed evolution.

decolorization result: Enhanced degradation rates due to added mediators
additional information: Degradation improvement was up to 3.4 times compared to original laccase.
The presence of ABTS improved the degradation ability.
